ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Lifeleech quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Need a druid to cast wolf form on you. The guy you get the faceted hycinth from along with the Dragonscale armor guy, who is in the same hut, are KoS to
ygData.messageBody:
--- Matt Price <mattren@...> wrote:
> Anyone on this list 50 and have done this quest?
>
> I'll be 50 in 2 weeks or so, bout halfway through 48
> now. I have a couple
> questions regarding the quest.
>
> 1.) The necro says to conceal your dark arts. this
> mean you have to have a
> non-necro\sk to do this part?
>
Need a druid to cast wolf form on you. The guy you get
the faceted hycinth from along with the Dragonscale
armor guy, who is in the same hut, are KoS to SKs


> 2.) can a group of 40-50s take the monstrous zombie
> that spawns? or will I
> need 2 groups?
>

We did it easily with 1 group. A cleric is a must
though. I got FEARd by him and ended up bugged. The
FEAR had worn off, but i kept running anyway. I could
sit down to stop running, but as soon as i stood, i
started running again. I had to camp out, but they
beat him even without me.


> 3.) why the heck are we getting more nerftaps in the
> expansion when we
> already have lifeleech?
>

Lifeleech has a 2 minute recast time, and takes about
2 bubbles of mana to cast. Sometimes you just dont
need that much, or you would rather cast faster
spells. Just like any good cleric has multiple Heals
mem'd and not just Complete Heal.



=====
Wherever a Light shines .. a Shadow is born.
Bathory D'Allatu
Cazic-Thule
